name: take care (shakespeareansushi)
description:
take care

You're driving your little sis home after a long day. Make the most of it: relationships are built in the in-between time just as much as in the time we schedule out, and every minute of our lives counts for something. How will little sis be feeling at the end of the night? Happy? Good? Quiet? Upset? It's up to you.

Dedicated to my own big bro, who takes care of me wonderfully. And always blasts heavy metal in his car, often to my consternation.
